Detailed Description

Provide Baudrate configuration for MCU.

  • Compiler: IAR EWAVR and GNU GCC for AVR
  • Supported devices: ATmega32U4

Author:
Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com
Support and FAQ: http://support.atmel.no/
